field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will activate the SCP backup plugin.

field.label: Remote Directory
field.help: Set the remote directory to backup the config file to.

field.label: SSH Private Key
field.help: The private key of the user. The paired public key must be added to the remote user's authorized_keys otherwise backups will fail.

field.label: Enable StrictHostKeyCheck
field.help: If enabled, SSH will never automatically add host keys. The host key value must be provided below.

field.label: Host Key
field.help: The host key to use for connection, only used if StrictHostKeyCheck is enabled.
